code:
C4Context
    title System Context diagram for Internet Banking System
    
    Person(customerA, "Banking Customer A", "A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts.")
    Person(customerB, "Banking Customer B", "A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts.")
    Person(customerC, "Banking Customer C", "A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts.")
    
    System(bankingSystem, "Internet Banking System", "Allows customers to check their accounts.")
    
    Rel(customerA, bankingSystem, "Uses")
    Rel(customerB, bankingSystem, "Uses")
    Rel(customerC, bankingSystem, "Uses")

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 我们需要加一个处理 customerA, "Banking Customer A", "A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts." 和 customerB, "Banking Customer B", "A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts." 的环节。

我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'customerA, "Banking Customer A", "A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts." 和 customerB, "Banking Customer B", "A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts."'，你看看合适吗？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
用户在这里会遇到 customerC, "Banking Customer C", "A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts." 和 bankingSystem, "Internet Banking System", "Allows customers to check their accounts." 的分支。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'customerC, "Banking Customer C", "A customer of the bank, with personal bank accounts." 和 bankingSystem, "Internet Banking System", "Allows customers to check their accounts."'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 customerA, bankingSystem, "Uses" 和 customerB, bankingSystem, "Uses" 这一块。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'customerA, bankingSystem, "Uses" 和 customerB, bankingSystem, "Uses"'，对吧？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 customerC, bankingSystem, "Uses" 这一块。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'customerC, bankingSystem, "Uses"'？
